'''Move Interactive, ProduÃ§Ãµes de Software S.A.''' is a [[Portugal|Portuguese]] software and multimedia developer.
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship [http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle.php?article_id=141] {{pt icon}} and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today. <br>
In their first year of operation the firm won the Madeira Inovation Prize for entrepreneurship [http://www.gamerstek.com/readarticle.php?article_id=141] {{pt icon}} and began a relationship with Gesventure, the noted Portuguese venture capital firm, that continues today. <br>

In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, '''[[Ugo Volt]]''', a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed by a Portuguese Company. <br>
+
In 2005 the company secured founding from PME Investimentos and Banif New Capital, allowing them to increase the peace of development for their debut project, '''[[Ugo Volt]]''', a videogame that is aimed to the international market, and if sucessfull, it will be the first of that scale to be developed in Portugal. <br>
On November, 26, 2007 in partnership with [[Sociedade Independente de ComunicaÃ§Ã£o|SIC]], Move Interactive released the '''[[Floribella (videogame)|Floribella Videogame]]''', [http://pc.ptgamers.com/noticia.asp?id_noticia=6030] {{pt icon}} based on the popular series [[Floribella]], this game was released after the end of the second season. <br>
On November, 26, 2007 in partnership with [[Sociedade Independente de ComunicaÃ§Ã£o|SIC]], Move Interactive released the '''[[Floribella (videogame)|Floribella Videogame]]''', [http://pc.ptgamers.com/noticia.asp?id_noticia=6030] {{pt icon}} based on the popular series [[Floribella]], this game was released after the end of the second season. <br>
Ugo Volt, was also the first portuguese game to be featured at [[E3]] (2006) [http://www.gesventure.pt/em_destaque/move_interactive.pdf] {{pt icon}}
